content:
Findings:
L1-L2 to L3-L4: Normal disc height and signal intensity. No herniation.
L4-L5: Mild disc bulge causing mild narrowing of the central canal and bilateral neural foramina.
L5-S1: Right paracentral disc herniation impinging on the right S1 nerve root.
Spinal Cord: Normal signal throughout.
Paraspinal Soft Tissues: Unremarkable.

Impression:
Right paracentral disc herniation at L5-S1 with impingement of the right S1 nerve root.
Mild degenerative changes at L4-L5.
